Detailed Description

A 4 x 4 transformation matrix.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzMatrix4::DzMatrix4 ( bool  initIdentity = false  ) 
Parameters:
makeIdentity If true, the matrix is initialized to the identity matrix.

DzMatrix4::DzMatrix4 ( const DzVec3 &  xAxis,
const DzVec3 &  yAxis,
const DzVec3 &  zAxis 
)

Constructor from three axes of the rotation coord system. These are assumed to be (but do not have to be if a sheared or warped coord system is desired) to be orthogonal unit vectors.

void DzMatrix4::decompose ( DzVec3 &  pos,
DzQuat &  rot 
) const

Decompose the matrix into position/rotation. This routine assumes that only translation/rotation have been applied to the matrix (for now).
